title: Data-Driven Intelligent Design and Simulation for Preserving Traditional Ethnic Textile Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Traditional Textile Culture and Fundamental Digital Tool Skills
context.additional_context: Learners engage in a process of understanding the cultural value of traditional textiles and exploring modern applications using digital technology. They analyze data provided through the LMS and deepen their understanding of actual textile production processes using simulation tools.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze design elements of traditional ethnic textiles using data-driven methods and design digital layouts.
Learners can simulate the realistic appearance of textiles by utilizing color extraction and texture rendering techniques.
Learners can explain how to apply traditional patterns to intelligent weaving systems integrated with industrial IoT technology.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
